description: Currently working as a Reporting Analyst, focusing on data analysis and report generation.

Conducting research on adolescent mental health, with focus on developmental, academic, and social impact. Collaborating with a youth-led nonprofit to develop educational content for social media and future website launch.

Supported early-stage company setup, including logo design and completing Companies House registration. Assisted with general admin tasks and provided PA-style support to founders. Currently planning the company's digital presence, including social media strategy and future website development.

Completed a focused 1:1 mentorship-based internship exploring SAP systems and architecture within an enterprise environment. Gained foundational understanding of SAP modules, system structure, and internal data flow. Learned about standard and custom table usage (e.g., MARA, Z-tables) and their role in managing business processes. Observed the integration of SAP APIs with frontend tools such as ASP.NET. Developed awareness of SAP BTP (Business Technology Platform) and modern approaches to cloud-based enterprise solutions. Practiced hands on with SAP system and ABAP.
Took part in the IEUK 2024 Technology Internship program.

Designed the company logo and created custom invoice templates for client use. Managed the business's Instagram presence to support local outreach. Assisted with day-to-day digital admin and branding tasks as needed.
Worked as part of a customer-facing team, developing strong communication and teamwork skills.
